## SubdivKernel.pre property

Optional function to pre-process the original curve points prior to each subdivision iteration and MUST yield an iterable of points (e.g. for closed curves / polygons to prepend the last point before the first). If omitted, the curve points are processed as is.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pre?: (pts: ReadonlyVec[]) => Iterable<ReadonlyVec>;
```
